page.title: 03A farmer's day (p.m.)
page.content:
After lunch I return to the fields to bale some hay and all goes well until suddenly I notice the bales on one side are not tied and on stopping find that the knotter is broken.I persuade the wife to go and get a replacement from the local spares depot while the broken part is removed and with the new part fitted and adjusted we hope to finish the field before calf feeding and teatime.If it looks like rain it's back to the field to haul and stack up bales till late evening, so to supper and bedtime ready for a busy day tomorrow.
A.J.Davies
